name: Yishen Rhee
description: Yishen Rheewas aMercenaryinCyberpunk. She made her first appearance in theCyberpunk 2077: Your Voicecomic, and appeared during themain jobNever Fade AwayinCyberpunk 2077. Yishen Rhee was a member of theRed WillowNomadsbefore moving toNight City. Sometime before2013, Rhee andJohnny Silverhandhad a falling out for an unknown reason after an event Silverhand assumed she "didn't like the last time". In April 2013, Rhee was at theClub Atlantisat the same time as Johnny Silverhand was searching forRogue Amendiares. Having trouble getting something out of a vending machine, she asked Silverhand to...
